name: precision-website-app
description: Precision Cabling Website - NOT JSON SERVER

scripts.validate: node -e "try { JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('package.json', 'utf8')); console.log('✓ Valid JSON'); } catch(e) { console.error('✗ Invalid JSON:', e.message); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = 'package.json'; try { const pkg = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(path, 'utf8')); fs.writeFileSync(path, JSON.stringify(pkg, null, 2) + '\n'); console.log('✓ package.json has been programmatically cleaned and rewritten.'); } catch (e) { console.error('✗ Failed to clean package.json:', e.message); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.postclean: git add package.json && git commit -m "Fix: Programmatically clean and rewrite package.json" && git push origin main

author: Precision
